contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=January 2009}} '''Xia Chuzhong''' ({{zh|c=夏楚中 |p=Xià Chǔzhòng}}) was a [[Kuomintang|KMT]] general from [[Yiyang]], [[Hunan]]. {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Xia, Chuzhong | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Chinese general | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xia, Chuzhong}} [[Category:National Revolutionary Army generals from Hunan]] [[Category:People from Yiyang]] {{China-mil-bio-stub}}
